index.title: Build
index.description: Begin your journey on ZetaChain, the decentralized blockchain and smart contract platform designed for omnichain interoperability.

apps.title: Universal Apps
apps.description: Explore the basics of developing on ZetaChain.

evm.title: Universal EVM
evm.description: EVM enhanced with omnichain interoperability features, enabling the development of robust universal apps.

standards.title: Universal Assets
standards.description: Learn about the different contract standards available on ZetaChain and how to use them.

chains.title: Connected Chains
chains.description: Use Gateway to make calls to and from universal apps, deposit and withdraw tokens.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guides to help you master building on ZetaChain.

protocol.title: Protocol Contracts
protocol.description: Documentation for the protocol contracts on ZetaChain and connected chains.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: Take an in-depth look into the inner workings and technical architecture of the ZetaChain protocol.
